name: Circa 1850® Heavy Body Paint & Varnish Remover
description: Circa 1850® Heavy Body Paint & Varnish Remover quickly and easily strips off multiple layers of oil, latex and epoxy paint; oil and latex varnish; polyurethane; moisture cure; lacquer and shellac. Its gel formula is ideal for exterior use and vertical surfaces. Safe to use on fine furniture – will not raise wood grain, harm most glue joints or veneers, or damage patina. May soften plastic and fiberglass. Circa 1850® Heavy Body Paint & Varnish Remover is non-flammable and almost odorless.
